synopsis.text:
Because of Japan's overcrowding, many supernatural beings have been displaced, leading to the emergence of a new occupation: Ghost Sweepers. These professionals, available to the highest bidder, specialize in exorcising unwanted spirits. Among the best is the Mikami GS Company, led by the captivating Reiko Mikami. Alongside her team, including a teenage assistant named Tadao Yokoshima and a ghostly girl named Okinu, Mikami offers services to eliminate any spectral adversary.

When a malevolent vampire sorcerer, Nosferatu, rises after a century-long slumber, he threatens to transform Tokyo's inhabitants into lifeless, mindless zombies. With the city on the brink of chaos, Mikami and her team are enlisted to hunt down Nosferatu and his sinister spider-like accomplice, Ranmaru.

Armed with the assistance of a samurai ghost and an ancient spear, Mikami and her crew face a daunting challenge. Can they vanquish this formidable demon and safeguard the world from impending doom? Join Mikami and her team in their thrilling and perilous journey to restore peace to Tokyo.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
